Verses: 1 movaabin Baaram. Iravile Movaabilulla Aar Ennum Pattanam Paazhaakkappattadhu, Adhu Sangaaramaayitru; Iravile Movaabilulla Keer Ennum Pattanam Paazhaakkappattadhu, Adhu Sangaaramaayitru.

2 azhumpadi Medaigalaagiya Paayiththukkum Theeponukkum Pogiraargal; Nepovinimiththamum Medhebaavinimiththamum Movaab Alarugiradhu; Avargaludaiya Thalaigalellaam Mottaiyadiththirukkum; Thaadigalellaam Kaththariththirukkum.
3 adhin Veedhigalil Rattaikkattikkondu, Ellaarum Adhin Veedugalmelum Adhin Therukkalilum Alari, Azhudhukondirukkiraargal.

4 espon Ooraarum Eleyaale Ooraarum Kookkuralidugiraargal; Avargal Saththam Yaagaasmattum Ketkappadugiradhu; Aagaiyaal Movaabin Aayudhapaanigal Kadharugiraargal; Avanavanudaiya Aaththumaa Avanavanil Kilesappadugiradhu.

5 en Irudhayam Movaabinimiththam Olamidugiradhu; Adhilirundhu Odivarugiravargal Moondru Vayadhu Kidaariyaippola Alaigiraargal; Loogiththukku Erippogira Vazhiyile Azhugaiyode Erugiraargal; Oronaayeemin Vazhiyile Norungudhalin Kookkural Idugiraargal.
6 nimreemin Neerppaaichchalaana Idangal Paazhaaippom; Pul Ularndhu, Mulai Azhindhu, Pachchaiyillaamarpogiradhu.
7 aadhalaal Migudhiyaaga Serththadhaiyum Avargal Sambaadhiththu Vaiththadhaiyum, Alarigalin Aatrukkappaale Eduththukkondupovaargal.
8 kookkural Movaabin Ellaiyengum Sutrum; Eklaayimmattum Adhin Alarudhalum, Pereleemmattum Adhin Pulambudhalum Ettum.
9 theemonin Thanneergal Raththaththaal Niraindhirukkum; Theemoninmel Adhiga Kedugalaik Kattalaiyiduven; Movaabile Thappinavargalmelum, Dhesaththil Meedhiyaanavargalmelum Singaththai Varappannuven.
